    src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/zhixuan2333/gh-blog@v0.1.0/js/nprogress.min.js"

    rel="stylesheet"

    integrity="sha384-KJyhr2syt5+4M9Pz5dipCvTrtvOmLk/olWVdfhAp858UCa64Ia5GFpTN7+G4BWpE"
    crossorigin="anonymous"
/>
<script>
    NProgress.start();
    document.addEventListener("readystatechange", () => {
        if (document.readyState === "interactive") NProgress.inc(0.8);
        if (document.readyState === "complete") NProgress.done();
    });
</script>

const util = require('util');

const child_process = require('child_process');

const exec = util.promisify(child_process.exec);

  

function getCreateTimeAsFileName() {

Â  Â  Â var d = new Date();

Â  Â  Â var year = d.getFullYear();

Â  Â  Â var month = d.getMonth()+1;

Â  Â  Â var day = d.getDate();

Â  Â  Â var hour = d.getHours();

Â  Â  Â var minute = d.getMinutes();

Â  Â  Â var second = d.getSeconds();

Â  Â  Â var time = year+"m"+month+"d"+day+"h"+hour+"m"+minute+"s"+second;

Â  Â  Â return time;

}

  

  

// execute command function

  

async function executeCommand() {

Â  Â  Â const fileName = "index.md";

Â  Â  Â const { stdout, stderr } = await exec('hugo new post/' + getCreateTimeAsFileName() +'/'+fileName,{cwd: app.fileManager.vault.adapter.basePath});

Â  Â  Â console.log('stdout:', stdout);

Â  Â  Â console.log('stderr:', stderr);

Â  Â  Â if (stdout) {

Â  Â  Â  Â  Â new Notice("New Blog Created["+fileName+"]")

Â  Â  Â }else{

Â  Â  Â  Â  Â new Notice("New Blog Create Faild. "+stderr)

Â  Â  Â }

}

  

  

module.exports = async function(context, req) {

Â  Â  await executeCommand();

}
